import axios from"axios";export const axiosInstance=axios.create({});export const apiConnector=(method,url,bodyData,headers,params)=>{// console.log(" Axios -> ",method,url,bodyData,headers)
return axiosInstance({method:"".concat(method),url:"".concat(url),data:bodyData?bodyData:null,headers:headers?headers:null,params:params?params:null});};
